alert.note: Alert for Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 5:52PM EST until December 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO NOON EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation including snow, sleet and freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Windsor County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to noon EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wintry mix including snow, sleet, and freezing rain will affect Windsor County early Wednesday morning. Freezing rain during the morning commute will make for some slippery surfaces and difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
